com.nhn.android.maps

Class FusedLocationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.maps.FusedLocationManager

  • public class FusedLocationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Location manager which implements FusedLocationListener.

    • Method Detail

      • setUpdateFrequency

        public void setUpdateFrequency(long minTime,
                      float minDistance)
        Set the frequency of location updates. If minTime is greater than 0, the LocationManager could potentially rest for minTime milliseconds between location updates to conserve power. If minDistance is greater than 0, a location will only be broadcasted if the device moves by minDistance meters. To obtain notifications as frequently as possible, set both parameters to 0.
        Parameters:
        minTime - the minimum time interval for location updates, in milliseconds.
        minDistance - the minimum distance interval for location updates, in meters.

      • stop
